HotelElement.Name: Petit Palace Posada del Peine-City Inn Madrid

Description.Text:
Historic building in the heart of the city centre. Excellent location, right next to the famous Plaza Mayor , magnificent rooms, personal computers with free WIFI connection in every room, hydromassage showers, flat screen TV. ALL THE LATEST TECNOLOGICAL INNOVATIONS! The Petit Palace Posada del Peine is a boutique hotel standing at one of the entrances to the Plaza Mayor, quite near the Puerta del Sol, in the historic centre of the city.The hotel, founded in 1610, has the honour of being the oldest hotel establishment in Spain. Located close to Madrid's main monuments and places of tourist interest. Historic centre of the city. The hotel offers the following FREE services: Personal computer in all rooms WIFI connection in all rooms and communal zones. (2MB ADSL) Daily Press Safety boxes (with capacity for a laptop) Hydromassage showers in all rooms. Bath in some rooms Information on local excursions, city maps, reservations for shows and restaurants. Two internet points for public use. Free bike rent. Luggage room. Children's facilities: cots and buggies (on request) Special discounts for our clients: 20% discount in the public parking in the Plaza del Carmen, (minimum 24 hours) please ask at the reception for more details. Body Factory gym offers an special discount for our guests. Further information: Sol underground station Public parking facility nearby (Plaza Mayor) All credit cards accepted Conference facilities Doctor on call Dry cleaning / Laundry service Lift / elevator Lobby Take advantage of our delicious buffet breakfast served daily from 07:30 - 10:30am. Breakfast includes: Freshly squeezed orange juice Local cheeses and cold meats Fresh rolls and pastrys Cereals Bacon, sausages and eggs Tea and coffee Our friendly staff will be more than happy to advise you on the best restaurants, shopping zones and local excursions.We also offer a unique free bicycle rent in order to get to know the city in an ecological way, and a free coffee and juice service in the reception. Dont loose the opportunity to visit us!! If you have any special requests please dont hesitate to contact us, we will be more than happy to make your stay as memorable as possible!! By reserving in our hotel you will receive an exclusive invitation to a typical Spanish tapa and glass of wine in the department store El Corte Ingles nearest to the hotel. One invitation per person. More information at the reception. Valid during 2009 while stocks last.
High Tech Hotels collaborates with the N.P.O Solidarity International by supporting the organization of artisan objects; SELYN of Sri Lanka through buying their hand made dolls by which they contribute to improving the living conditions of the families of Kunergala, Sri Lanka.
Located in Postas st between Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol.

Standard Room - The room offers Twin or double bed. High Tech Rooms Double/DSU, Doubles/Double for single use, with Flat panel Personal Computer (Note Book), free laptop and high speed Internet access (LMDS-2Mb), Flat screen TV TFT of 20 inches, hydro-shower, a/c, balcony terrace, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, safe in room.
Family Room - The room offers Twin and bunk bed, double bed and bunk bed. Family Rooms, 4 people capacity, with free high laptop and speed access to The Internet (LMDS-2Mb) last generation hydro-massage showers. Flat TV TFT of 23 inches, a/c, balcony terrace, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, safe in room.
